articles.description: When it comes to the first Diwali after marriage, it's all about family. Several actors have recently married, and they tell us how much they are looking forward to the festival of lights. They believe it's the ideal time to go shopping, eat their favourite t…
articles.content: Sreejita De recently got hitched to her longtime boyfriend Michael Blohm Pape, she exclusively shared with BT about her plans, "This is our first Diwali after marriage and Michael loves Indian festiv… [+722 chars]
